eas_text: A civil authority has issued A LOCAL AREA EMERGENCY for the following counties or areas: Chelan, WA; at 08:23 PM ON DEC 10, 2025 Effective until 12:23 AM DEC 11, 2025. Message from WSLF/CAP.
extra_text: Warning.  Numerous roadways in western Chelan County are blocked by downed trees or powerlines.  For safety the Sheriff's Office is requesting citizens avoid traveling on the roadways until conditions improve. Please stay off the roadways
